title: MOOC-Based Training Course for Strengthening Technical Competencies of Drinking Water System Operators

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science and engineering concepts
context.additional_context: Designing interactive learning environments using digital devices. Providing continuous feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: They can explain the basic components and operational principles of a drinking water system.
They can apply core technologies in water quality analysis and water purification processes.
They can systematically perform problem-solving procedures in emergency situations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
